DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to characterize the interactive effects of acute intravenous (IV) alcohol and nicotine administration in male and female smokers and nonsmokers who use alcohol.
DOC.brief_title: Interactive Psychopharmacologic Effects of Alcohol and Nicotine in Humans
DOC.criteria: Male or Female, 21 to 50 years old. Alcohol or Nicotine Naive
